title: July 18th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: July 18th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Vabbing and Gen Z, Constance Wu, Love is Blind Lawsuit, Update on Johnny Depp & Amber Heard, Jen Shah, Tom Brady, & Kardashian Family Update
description:
This week we've got a lot of content to parse through from updates to last week's headlines to chit chatting about Gen Z trends. From discussing the Love is Blind lawsuit to our usual Kardashian Family update, please see below for the topics of the week:


Last Week Update

  • Armie Hammer confirmed working as a timeshare salesman in the Cayman Island according to sources
  • Noah Shnapps says all is well with him and Doja Cat


TikTok Trend

  • Vabbing 


Constance Wu

  • Constance Wu says she attempted suicide after Fresh off the Bot Backlash


Love is Blind Lawsuit

  • Love is Blind Cast Member Sues Show claiming contestants were denied food and water


Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Case

  • Judge Rejects Amber Heard’s request to set aside Depp win


Jen Shah

  • Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, Jen Shah, pleads guilty to fraud charges


Tom Brady

  • Tom Brady says that his wealth is the hardest thing about parenting


Kardashian Family Update

  • Khloe and Tristan expecting a second child via surrogate






Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
